title: Reduction in LPG price, a new year gift to people: Fawad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 31 (APP):Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain on Friday said that after the launch of health card, the government had given a new year gift to the people by reducing the price of Liquefied Petroleum Gas (LPG) by up to Rs6 per kg.
In a tweet, he said this would directly benefit 72 per cent of the countryâ€™s population who were deprived of piped gas.
In 2022, the minister said, a sharp decline in energy and food prices was expected.
